articles.author: ESPN
articles.title: March Madness live tracker: Highlights, updates, reactions and more - ESPN Australia
articles.description: Follow along as we track 16 more games in the round of 64 of the men's NCAA tournament.
articles.content:
After an exciting Day 1 in the NCAA tournament, 32 more teams are in action Friday.
The games tip off at 12:15 p.m. ET, and we've got a full 12 (or more!) hours of hoops in store, including the NCAA… [+1790 chars]
